message.body: I'm coming to the show today with my brother!!! How do we get dem cheap tix?

Umm... I guess just try to sweet talk them at the door?? sorry! that's not very helpful!! you could also just sneak into the balcony! i won't be there this afternoon (i have big sib interviews to conduct) but good luck!!
Haha alright, thanks! Have fun with your interviews!
